Question: AI Guided Limited CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
AI Guided Limited

CES 2024

Motion Pillow

- Uses AI to tackle snoring problems and improve sleep
- AI Motion System detects snoring and adjusts airbags to reposition the user's head
- Accompanying app tracks sleep data and offers real-time monitoring with the Motion Ring
- Earned CES 2024 Innovation Award in the Smart Home category
- Available for $699, with a 40% discount during the CES exhibition period, retailing at $420.
